dailySongDescription.title: Guess de song
dailySongDescription.description: You have the opportunity to guess the title of a song, but you only have three attempts! With each attempt, the length of the song will increase by a few seconds, but you will earn fewer points.
dailySongDescription.question: Are you ready for the musical challenge?
